    • REACH_DISTANCE

      public static final RegistryObject<Attribute> REACH_DISTANCE
      Reach Distance represents the distance at which a player may interact with the world. The default is 4.5 blocks. Players in creative mode have an additional 0.5 blocks of reach distance.
      See Also:
      • IForgePlayer.getReachDistance()
      • IForgePlayer.canInteractWith(BlockPos, double)
      • IForgePlayer.canInteractWith(Entity, double)

    • ATTACK_RANGE

      public static final RegistryObject<Attribute> ATTACK_RANGE
      Attack Range represents the distance at which a player may attack an entity. The default is 3 blocks. Players in creative mode have an additional 3 blocks of attack reach.
      See Also:
      • IForgePlayer.getAttackRange()
      • IForgePlayer.canHit(Entity, double)

    • STEP_HEIGHT_ADDITION

      public static final RegistryObject<Attribute> STEP_HEIGHT_ADDITION
      Step Height Addition modifies the amount of blocks an entity may walk up without jumping.
      See Also:
      • IForgeEntity.getStepHeight()
